alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Cass (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 9:27PM EST until March 09 at 1:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio... Michigan... Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting St. Joseph, Cass MI and Berrien Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river as well as flooding of basements in Niles can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 11.8 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage by early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
